scripts.ci-deploy-base: VITE_APP_ENV=${ENV} VITE_APP_SHA=${GIT_HEAD:-$(git rev-parse --short HEAD)} VITE_APP_VERSION=$(node -pe 'require("./package.json").version') npm run build:${ENV} && aws s3 sync build/ s3://telemed-intake.user.com --profile user --region us-east-1 --delete && aws cloudfront create-invalidation --profile user --distribution-id ${CLOUDFRONT_ID} --paths '/*' --region us-east-1
scripts.ci-deploy:development: ENV=development PREFIX=development CLOUDFRONT_ID= npm run ci-deploy-base
